## Instructions

Create a web page using R Markdown that features a map created with Leaflet. The map has the information related to Universidad Nacional de Colombia - Bogot√° campus.

## Loading the library

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
```

## Preload map

```{r}
university_location <- leaflet() %>% 
  addTiles()
university_location
```
## Final map

```{r}
library(leaflet)
my_map_ <- university_location %>%
  addMarkers(lat= 4.6355555555556, lng=-74.082777777778, 
             popup="Nacional University")
my_map_
```
